SignatureRequestDesc.message: You should only sign this message if you fully understand its contents and trust the requesting website.

LedgerNotSupport.message: Ledger accounts do not currently support this transaction

SelectOneAddress.message: Please select at least one address

AllowSwitchTo.message: Allow this site to switch to

BeforeConfirming.message: Before confirming, please insert your Ledger device and select Ethereum application.

BeforeConfirmingFil.message: Before confirming, please insert your Ledger device and select Filecoin application.

ForgotDeviceContent.message: It will erase the previously connected and imported accounts. If you want to recover them, you will need to import them again.

PlugYourLedger.message: 1. Plug your Ledger directly into your computer

ChooseTheAccount.message: 3. Choose the account you want to connect

PleaseEnterA616DigitPasswordErr.message: Please enter an 8~16 digit password, must contain a number, an upper case letter and a special charactor

PleaseOneUpperCase.message: At least one upper case character

IfTheWalletIsReset.message: If the wallet is reset, all the data will be deleted and cannot be retrieved. Are you sure you want to reset?

PleaseEnterTheWalletName.message: Please enter the wallet name, 1~20 characters

PleaseEnterA616DigitPassword2.message: Please enter a 8~16-digit password, in numbers, letters, and special symbols

TheTwoPasswordsDoNotMatch.message: The two passwords do not match, please re-enter

InTheNextStep.message: In the next step, you will see the mnemonic phrases (12 words) that allow you to restore your wallet.

IfYourMnemonicPhrasesAreLost.message: 1. If your mnemonic phrases are lost, your assets will be lost forever.

IfYourMnemonicPhrasesAreCompromised.message: 2. If your mnemonic phrases are compromised, your assets may be lost.

YouHaveTheResponsibilityToKeep.message: 3. You have the responsibility to keep your own mnemonic phrases safe.

TopiaIsADecentralizedWallet.message: 4. Topia is a decentralized wallet and will not store your private key or mnemonic phrases. Once the private key and mnemonic phrases are lost, they cannot be retrieved.

DoNotTakeScreenshotsOrShare.message: 1. Do not take screenshots or share your mnemonic phrases, which may be intercepted by third-party malware and cause asset loss.

CheckYourSurroundings.message: 2. Check your surroundings carefully to ensure that there is no one or no camera around.

ClickOnTheWordsToPutThemInTheCorrectOrde.message: Click on the words to put them in the correct order

GoToTOPScanForMoreRecords.message: Go to TOPScan for more records

GoToFILScanForMoreRecords.message: Go to scan for more records

IncorrectAddressFormat.message: Incorrect address format, please enter again

SenderRecipientNotBeSame.message: Sender and recipient could not be the same.

Note01TOP.message: Note: 0.1 TOP of your balance will be used as margin and cannot be transferred out.

ConnectingTheWebsite.message: Connecting the website will allow the site to view your account assets

ToKeepYourAccountSafe.message: To keep your account safe, please connect to a website you trust

ImportedAccountsWillNot.message: Imported accounts will not be associated with the mnemonic phrases of the original Topia account

IncorrectPrivateKey.message: Incorrect private key, please enter again

IncorrectMnemonicPhrases.message: Incorrect mnemonic phrases, please enter again

TheNewAccountWillBeBasedOn.message: The new account will be based on the mnemonic phrases you originally created/imported

DontShowThisAccountMnemonicToAnyone.message: Don't show this account mnemonic to anyone!

ThisAccountMnemonicCanBe.message: This account mnemonic can be used to steal all of your accounts

NoteNeverMakeYourPrivateKeyPublic.message: Note: Never make your private key public. Anyone with your private key can obtain your asset.

NoteNeverMakeYourPrivateKeyPublic2.message: Note: Never make your mnemonic phrases public. Anyone with your mnemonic phrases can obtain your asset.

EachTOPAccountWillInitially.message: Each TOP account will initially have 25,000 Tgas as the transfer fee. By default, if the account balance is greater than 100 TOP Token, the Tgas of the account will restore to 25,000 every day.

YourMnemonicsHaveNotBeenBackedUp.message: Your mnemonics have not been backed up, please back up them to prevent loss of assets caused by forgetting the password or deleting the application by mistake.

PleaseInputAddress.message: Please input the token contract address

SureAdd.message: Would you like to import this token?

RemarkInformation128.message: Remark information can be 128 characters at most

IHaveRead.message: I have read and agree to the

ResettingAccount.message: Resetting your account will clear your transaction history. This will not change the balances in your accounts or require you to re-enter your Secret Recovery Phase.

YouDontYetHave.message: You don't yet have a Filecoin account, create one now?

EnterToUnlockTransfer.message: Enter your wallet password to unlock transfer

EnterToRevealBalance.message: Enter your wallet password to reveal balance.

ForSecurityReasons.message: For security reasons, please enter your password to unlock transfer:
